title: Authorizes the village of Goshen, Orange county, to appoint Michael Wilson from part-time to full-time competitive police officer status
summary: Authorizes the village of Goshen, Orange county, to appoint Michael Wilson from part-time to full-time competitive police officer status.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         2709

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 20, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by M. of A. RABBITT -- read once and referred to the Commit-
         tee on Governmental Employees

       AN ACT to authorize the village of Goshen in Orange  county  to  appoint
         Michael Wilson to a full-time competitive police officer position

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Notwithstanding the provisions of section 58 of  the  civil
    2  service law, the village of Goshen in Orange county is hereby authorized
    3  and  directed,  upon  the  approval of the village board of trustees, to
    4  appoint Michael Wilson, who is currently a part-time police officer  for
    5  the  village  of  Goshen  police  department, to a full-time competitive
    6  position as a police officer with the police department of such village.
    7    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.







        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD03893-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to authorize the village of Goshen in Orange county to appoint Michael Wilson to a full-time competitive police officer position
